settings.title: Record locking
settings.description: Configure optimistic/pessimistic locking and conflict handling.
settings.strategy_help_optimistic: Multiple users can edit at the same time; conflicts are checked on save.
settings.strategy_help_pessimistic: First editor acquires the lock and blocks concurrent edits until release.

settings.enabled_resources_hint: Pick from suggestions or type a custom resource kind.
